title: The Floor
overview: One hundred quiz enthusiasts, a gigantic LED floor divided into one hundred equal areas, each with its own knowledge category and a prize of no less than 100,000 euros: that is The Floor! In this brand new game show, a hundred candidates compete against each other in quiz duels under the guidance of presenter Edson da Gra√ßa. Each participant stands on his own level. The goal of The Floor? Conquer the whole floor! Who knows the most about each category? Who manages to be the only one left, conquers the entire floor and walks away with a barrel?
